journals.notes: I disagree with this one. This is part of the game, and you should be careful before reloading. If you're not sure, switch to secondary immediately, and wait for a 'safe' time before reloading.

I do agree to spyhawk :)

I can imagine this would mess up animations. What about if the magazine is removed and reload is interrupted? -> Closed.

subject: cancel reload by switching weapons
description:
Reported by hatcher:
Players should be able to cancel the reload action to be able to defend themselves in a sudden firefight. They are already weakened by wasting time pulling out the secondary.

Switching weapons during reload, even milliseconds before finishing, should obviously result in an empty clip when switched back. As this might result for unwanted behaviour for people who want to switch after reload and preliminarily press 2, this might need a cvar.

If you still have bullets in your primary and want to reload to get a full clip, you should not be allowed to cancel the reload and shoot the remaining bullets. Cancelling should only be allowed by switching to the secondary weapon.
